title: Saving Private Flint
description: Saving Private Flint is a 3D adventure/action game, your goal is to defeat and at the same time save your evil brother Flint and his army of woodland creatures he turned evil. Save him and along with it you will save the world!

title: Pictures
description:
Pictures is a multiplatform minimal picture viewing application made with Electron. The current tested and working platforms are Windows and MacOs. I made this project to improve my JavaScript, Node.js & multiplatform skills.

The general styling idea is to make it as minimal as possible, no borders and the top bar disappears unless locked.

title: Destructible terrain
description: A small game with a dynamic destructible terrain made in C++ and uses the libraries SFML and Box2D. This project was made to further enhance my knowledge of using libraries in C++

title: Astrozone
description: Astrozone is a local multiplayer 1v1 game where you fight for the territories of different planets, fight back and forth for territory until all territories have been taken by the winning player!

title: Angry Birds
description: A small segment of Angry Birds remade in Unity with C#, based of this segment. I learned a lot about working with 2D sprites in this project, I also improved my C# and Unity knowledge.

title: Game of Life
description: Conway's game of life made in C++, this project was made to improve my knowledge of working with object orientated C++ and the SFML graphics library.
